options.age_verify_text:
Are you over 18?

You must be 18 years of age or older to view page. Please verify your age to enter.
options.age_verify_text_error:
Access forbidden

Your access is restricted because of your age.
options.cookies_text: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. By browsing this website, you agree to our use of cookies.
options.empty_compare_text:
No products added in the compare list. You must add some products to compare them.
You will find a lot of interesting products on our "Shop" page.
options.empty_cart_text:
Πριν προχωρήσετε στο ταμείο, πρέπει να προσθέσετε ορισμένα προϊόντα στο καλάθι αγορών σας.
Δείτε τα προϊόντα που σας ενδιαφέρουν επιλέγοντας την κατάλληλη κατηγορία απο το menu

You will find a lot of interesting products on our "Shop" page.

options.recover_guest_cart_privacy_checkbox_text:
If you check this box, you are giving us permission to save some of your details into a contact list. You may receive email messages containing information of commercial or promotional nature concerning this store.
Personal Data collected: email address, first name and last name.
